headline: Fabric8Labs Secures $50M to Expand U.S. Advanced Manufacturing Capacity
summary: Fabric8Labs, the company pioneering Electrochemical Additive Manufacturing, today announced a $50 million funding round to expand its U.S.-based advanced manufacturing facilities, boosting capacity to produce tens of millions of components annually. Powered by its breakthrough Electrochemical Additive Manufacturing (ECAM) technology, Fabric8Labs is scaling up production of next-generation electronics components that enable leading-edge systems in thermal management (AI/HPC), wireless communicati
